name: Bouncing Ball Hero - Don't Be Touch Squared
name_original: Bouncing Ball Hero - Don't Be Touch Squared
description:
Play fun games to test skills control the your hero.
Bounce the hero and avoid touching the obstacles.
Run on planet surface, jump over obstacles, touch star and earn points.

How long will you survive?

-tap to make a jump
-avoid obstacles
-survive as long as possible

Have fun!
